title: Is it permissible for women to travel alone
transcript: asha had three questions first of all she's asking is it permissible for someone to travel from Delhi to Jeddah without a Muharram for a female and answer is definitely not this is not permissible this is the photo of the Prophet Elias of Salaam when he said that it is not permissible for a woman who believes in Allah on the day of judgement to travel without a Muharram so she has to have a Muharram accompanying her whether she is from Delhi to Jeddah or even from Cairo to Jeddah which is couple hours or even from Bahrain to to Jeddah or to the Dammam secondly she says that
